change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Andres Moreno, 1840-1887, served in the 1st Infantry Regiment of the Arizona Volunteers, U.S. Army in 1865-1866. The collection includes photostats of enlistment and discharge papers, and record of service for Moreno, and muster roll of Captain Hiram S. Washburn's Company E, 1st Infantry Regiment, Arizona Volunteers, from Nov. 2 to Dec. 31, 1865, at Fort Whipple. Accompanied by correspondence, 1964, from Frank Moreno, donor and grandson, giving biographical information.

repository.label: Repository

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Papers of Andres Moreno (AZ 100). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Frank W. Moreno, 1964.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Served in the 1st Infantry Regiment, Arizona Volunteers, U.S. Army, 1865-1866.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 2 series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Includes photostats of enlistment and discharge papers, and record of service for Moreno, and muster roll of Captain Hiram S. Washburn's Company E, 1st Infantry Regiment, Arizona Volunteers, from Nov. 2 to Dec. 31, 1865, at Fort Whipple. Accompanied by correspondence, 1964, from Frank Moreno, donor and grandson, giving biographical information.

relatedmaterial.p: Photocopies. Originals in National Archives and War Dept. files.
